title: How to Weather the Economic Storm | Guest: Ben Grzadzielewski | 4/7/22
description:
The corporate media is finally admitting Hunter Biden’s laptop is real … in a blood-curdling way. Glenn explains why Texas Gov. Greg Abbott’s newest border move is “all hat and no cattle.” Glenn reviews the latest terrifying inflation news from around the world and gives his top tips for how to weather the coming economic storm. Glenn and Stu take a preparedness quiz. Will Glenn’s prepping finally pay off? Grand Forks, North Dakota, resident Ben Grzadzielewski joins to explain why he’s fighting a proposed Chinese-owned corn-milling plant in his small town. President Biden threatens Amazon in support of unions. Will the government nationalize Major League Baseball?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
